game

Class MamboMarie

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      • game.ZombieActor
        • game.MamboMarie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActorInterface

    public class MamboMarie
extends ZombieActor
    Class that represents as a type of Enemy that is allowed to spawn 5 new zombies in every 10 turns and will disappear after 30 turns
    Author:
    weijianlai

    • Method Detail

      • playTurn

        public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
        * Returns an Action to be performed during its turn. It will be able to perform chanting which will spawn 5 zombies in every 10 turns. Else, it will just wanders around the map.
        Specified by:
        playTurn in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
        Parameters:
        actions - list of possible Actions
        lastAction - previous Action, if it was a multiturn action
        map - the map where the current Mambo Marie is
        display - the Display where the Mambo Marie's utterances will be displayed
        Returns:
        the Action to be performed

      • isMambo

        public boolean isMambo()
        return the instance of mambo marie. It will return true if its a mambo marie. This is to allow to check from other classes to see if the actor is a mambo marie.

      • isAlive

        public boolean isAlive()
        return a boolean value of false when the mambo marie disappeared from the map. This means that mambo is not dead yet, just temporarily disappear
